Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • Common.Task
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Task>

    public class Task
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Task>
    Use to represent one single Task
    Author:
    Yichen
